SceneSettings.Enabled: Enable the module to work for this scene

Colors.Overlay.Label: Overlay Color
Colors.Overlay.Hint: When using an overlay image, the overlay color is ignored.
Colors.Partial.Label: Partly Revealed Overlay Color
Colors.Partial.Hint: Leave empty to use the overlay color for partly revealed grid tiles or no color if using an overlay image. When using an overlay image, this color will only be visible for the GM.

SceneSettings.Image.Label: Overlay Image

GridReveal.Label: Extend Revealed Tiles
GridReveal.Hint: Set this if you want the revealed grid tiles to extend a certain amount into hidden grid tiles and partly revealed grid tiles. This does not extend the partly revealed grid tiles.

Options.behindDrawings: Cover the map and non-overhead tiles
Options.behindTokens: Cover the map, non-overhead tiles, and drawings

Position.Label: Overlay Position
Position.Hint: Whether it should display below drawings, tiles, and tokens or above.

Opacity.Title: Set GM Overlay Opacities
Opacity.Hidden: Game Master Hidden Grid Tiles Opacity
Opacity.Partial: Game Master Partly Revealed Grid Tiles Opacity

ResetDialog.Title: Reset Scene?
ResetDialog.Content: Are you sure you want to reset and update the entire scene?
ResetDialog.Confirm: Type this exact code in the box below in order to proceed: {code}

Notifications.Migrated: World Explorer | Completed migration for the current scene
